introduction.p: PCC and the world at large offer several resources that you may benefit from while taking this course.

paragraphs.title: Tutoring
paragraphs.p: The Student Learning Center at Cascade offers free tutoring in math. You should find some time to check it out, if you haven't already. Details can be found at www.pcc.edu/resources/tutoring/cascade.

paragraphs.title: PCC Student Learning Center Math Self-Study Resources
paragraphs.p: Some PCC faculty have been putting together self-study material for mathematics topics, including the topics in this course. If you would like to see an alternative to what is in your textbook, please visit spot.pcc.edu/slc/mathresources/output/html/.

paragraphs.title: College Success Courses
paragraphs.p: There are several one-credit courses available to help you maximize your success in the college experience. These include courses specifically geared toward study skills. The following site offers information on these courses as well as tips for success: www.pcc.edu/resources/panther-tracks/college-success/study-skills.html.

paragraphs.title: Online Videos
paragraphs.p: At the Khan Academy (www.khanacademy.org) you can find thousands of 10- to 30-minute videos on various mathematics topics. See what you can find that may be relevant to the topics we are studying in class using appropriate search terms.
Khan Academy is just one such site. See what else you can find online searching for math videos. If you find a series of videos that you feel is helpful, keep visiting them as the term progresses.

paragraphs.title: Counseling Services
paragraphs.p: Get help with personal or career concerns that may be impacting your academic success. Trained professional counselors can also assist you with decision-making, goal-setting, and personal development.

paragraphs.title: Multicultural Center
paragraphs.p: A welcoming and inclusive space for diverse students. One of the many services is one-on-one help for math courses, drop-in or by appointment:

paragraphs.p: A welcoming and safe space to hang out and be yourself. Free computer use, coffee and more:

paragraphs.p: Internet access, mathematics computer programs, and more (orientation required).
